newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Bavaria Colombia's most active April stock.
newsitem.headline: Bavaria Colombia's most active April stock.

text.p: Brewer Bavaria SA was the most actively traded stock on Colombia's three stock exchanges in April, the Securities Superintendency said.
Bavaria, which ranks among the world's top eight brewers, has outperformed the market by more than 50 percent in dollar terms so far this year.
The second most actively traded stock in April was Banco de Colombia, according to the superintendency.

It added that companies holding the third to eighth place ranking all belonged to the powerful Sindicato Antioqueno conglomerate. These included leading cement maker Compania de Cementos Argos ; Cadenalco SA, the country's largest retailer in terms of size and sales; and Banco Industrial Colombiano.
